decoworld.model.sound

Class Track

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.sound.Track

  • public class Track
extends java.lang.Object
    A track is a representation of a streamed audio file from hard disk It makes great use of many libGDX functions but has been adjusted greatly to suit the purposes of the DECOWORLD project A track can either be played singly or as part of a collection [SoundCollection]

    • Method Detail

      • playCollection

        public void playCollection(java.lang.String collectionName,
                  int order)
        Start playing collection of sounds in a randomized fashion
        Parameters:
        collectionName - name of collection to be played
        order - 0 : play randomly 1 : play linear natural order -1 : play linear backwards order

      • playSingleTrack

        public void playSingleTrack(java.lang.String trackName)
        Changes the music to the given audio track and plays it once
